alpha.title: Tweeten Alpha 10
alpha.description:
Hi everyone,

Today we are releasing Build 10 to testers in the alpha update channel.

The update includes new improvements.

Here's what's new:

  • Lots and lots of bug fixes

beta.title: Tweeten Beta 1.4
beta.description:
Hi everyone,

We are back! Today we are releasing Beta 1.4 to testers in the beta update channel.

Here's what's new:

  • Lots of improvements for the Light Theme
  • Added Light theme support to Modal
  • Added light theme support for Compose menu
  • Added light theme support for Polls and Twitter Cards
  • Fixed a bug where the window would overflow in multiple monitors
  • Fixed an issue where the window would not minimize
  • Fixed DM UI for Dark theme
  • Lots of other bug fixes and UI tweaks
